creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
for performance reasons, we should replace the current javascript code for the
sitetree widget with one that loads subtrees asynchronously. an example is
available at http://webfx.eae.net/dhtml/xloadtree/usage.html but unfortunately
licensed under GPL.

It's now in the trunk, and should also work for the BXE link-lookup.

There is an issue with the labels of the sitetrees: they are hardcoded (english
only) in the SitetreeFragmentGenerator.

These labels are stored in the sitetree as follows:
<site i18n:attr="label" label="Authoring">
(which is later replaced by the i18n transformer). 

There is no method in the SiteTree class to access the label. Maybe such a
method getLabel() should be added, and then the i18n transformer could be used
in the sitemap to get the correct language.
creator: josias.thoeny@wyona.org

treeview patch for lenya 1.2.x

I have ported this to Lenya 1.2.x, and I replaced the tree library by the one
from Guido Wesdorp. I had to change quite a lot, so testing would be
appreciated.
The attatchment contains all changed/new files and a file 'changes.txt' which
shows which files have been added/modified/removed. There is also a file
'lenya.diff' which shows changes of all modified files.
